instruction: What metric was chosen on the feasibility of a computationally-efficient CAD system for breast lesion classification, and how far can this metric go?

The specificity values achieved by the system are as follows:

- Using CESM images: 93.37% specificity
- Using SynCESM images: 91.58% specificity.
